Articles.Content:
Yes, It is I, Doctor Octopus Jr. (Inferior and Ungentlemanly people refer to me as DoctoOcto) Bask in my presence.

..

...

...

That's enough. I do not want your COMMON taint on my new suit.

Anyhow, I came to this "Kerbal Space Program" in hope's that it'll quell to my interests. You are all lucky that you have a GENIUS Rocket Scientist in your community. (You can't even comprehend my intelligence, Can't you. It's okay. I expected that from the common population.)

It pain's me but I feel it is necessary to tell you that I will.....Enjoy my time here....I'm getting more infected with your common culture....

Anyways, It is the best YOUR interests match mine. Because remember. I am a Genius Octopus Rocket Scientist. You'll never understand MY definition of rocketry. Back in the north Atlantic, We didn't have common rubble...Everyone was up-to the top shape and form. We are referred to as "Upper Class".

I best get going lest I'll be subdued by your inferior contraptions...

Before I go, Here is a picture of me for your common dirty finger's to grasp at.
You'll find one of your relatives out on Bop. He's seen better days.

At least you won't eat our ships.

Welcome to the community.
I used to make inferior rockets, then I learned to always use sepratrons for THRUST, not for de-orbiting debris. Also, ablation cascades are cool.
North Atlantic? Might you have anything to do with the Titanic? Perhaps it's the Kraken's sea-bound cousin.

You'll find one of your relatives out on Bop. He's seen better days.

How DARE you compare me to something lowdown as that malformed Kraken! I am a superior being compared to HIM.....He bullied me in high school....But enough now. I must be off to my expensive lounge. (That you'll never afford..)
Top ho, old chap! Perhaps you would care to join me aboard my orbiting mansion for a spot of whisky and billiards?

So you're superior, but you make spelling mistakes?

Jk Welcome to the community.
Wait, if you launched the iceberg at the Titanic your going to bop with the kraken D:< Im related to someone who went down with the ship.
This is great, lol, a cephalopod, always loved the taste of scungilli.

welcome, and you are right ..

"You can't even comprehend my intelligence, Can't you"

lol no I can't

Carry on good sir.
Submit a ship to the Spiritwolf/Hanland War and we'll see if you really are so superior...

Submit a ship to the Spiritwolf/Hanland War and we'll see if you really are so superior...

He didn't mention his superiority in military engineering.

Thus, I believe he is better than us space-fighting humans.

Sir, would thou fancy a cup of tea?

*steps down off the crag, the smell of flamer fuel and burnt bug hanging over his power armor* *spits on the dusty ground* Whassit called? Call-I-Mary? Call-i-mahr-ee? I dunno, *pumps shotgun and flashes a grin* but it's real tasty.

Welcome!

-Duxwing

We got a code Blue-15: Gentlemanly octopus in area 2!

Welcome!
